SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Color
The Color enum represents different colors that can be used in the application.
Feedback
The Feedback class represents feedback after each guess in a Mastermind game.
GameBoard
The GameBoard class manages the game state in a Mastermind game.
Guess
The Guess class represents a player's guess in a Mastermind game.
GuessValidator
The GuessValidator class provides methods to validate player guesses in a Mastermind game.
Main
The Main class is the entry point for the Mastermind game.
Mastermind
The Mastermind class orchestrates the flow of a Mastermind game.
Player
The Player class represents a player in a Mastermind game.
